title: The "Manohari Haaram": Exquisite Ruby, Emerald, and Pearl Long Necklace
materials: 9 pearls in pendant). Finished with traditional Hyderabadi polish for a rich
features: A stunning three-layered long necklace featuring a cascading design with intricate filigree work and delicate gemstone settings. The focal point is a beautifully crafted pendant adorned with a large central emerald and pearl drops. The Haaram showcases traditional Telugu design elements, including floral motifs (puspala), paisley patterns, and a classic mango design (maangai).
colors: and iridescent pearl white. This classic combination is highly auspicious in South Indian traditions.
occasions: and grand festivals like Diwali and Sankranthi. This statement piece will elevate any formal occasion.
description: A true heirloom piece, the Manohari Haaram is a symbol of prosperity and grace. The high-quality gemstones and meticulous craftsmanship ensure lasting beauty and value. Its traditional design, blended with modern elegance, makes it a versatile and treasured addition to any jewelry collection. This piece embodies the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad and its legacy of fine jewelry making.
